argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tuslem.k | |- K = ( toUnifSp ` U ) |
| 2 |  | tustopn.j | |- J = ( unifTop ` U ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_tuslem | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( X = ( Base ` K ) /\ U = ( UnifSet ` K ) /\ ( unifTop ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simp3d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( unifTop ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> J = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
